narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Children's Dental Health Associates is a Dentist, Pediatric Dentistry provider based in Chadds Ford, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $40.6M in Medicaid payments across 1.1M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $40.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
